turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can I help u?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted a place to order at Bella Luna for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me place the order for u. what did u want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I wanted to get four large gluten-free pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. and for the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, so are you ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. The first one, I want green pepper, tomato, mushroom, and onion. And then on the second one, I want onion and green peppers. For the third, make it all of it in feta cheese. And for the last one, just a meatball pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so you want 4 large pizzas, all gluten free, 1 green peppers, tomatoes, mushroom and onion, 1 with onion and green peppers, 1 with olive and feta cheese, and 1 with meatballs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, gluten-free crust for all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. How much is that going to be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $64.29 is the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okie doke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead. Actually, why don't you wait about 15 minutes to put it in cuz I have to run an errand before I go to the pizza place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, I'll put the order in 15 minutes for you. And the food will be ready in 35 minutes thereafter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, that'll that'll work well. No, that'll that'll do it. All right, bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.
